item.title: Port raises $100M at $800M valuation to take on Spotify’s Backstage
item.description: Port offers a proprietary alternative to Spotify's popular devtool catalog Backstage, but with a valuable addition: it can be used to manage AI agents...

item.title: Runware raises $50M Series A to help make image, video generation easier for developers
item.description: Runware lets developers integrate realtime image generation in their apps, with an affordable pricing model.

item.title: Harness hits $5.5B valuation with $240M raise to automate AI’s ‘after-code’ gap
item.description: Goldman Sachs has led Harness's Series E round, with participation from IVP, Menlo Ventures, and Unusual Ventures.

item.title: Baby delivered in Waymo continues proud tradition of not making it to the hospital
item.description: Some traditions, it seems, are immune to disruption.

item.title: Google’s answer to the AI arms race — promote the guy behind its data center tech
item.description: Amin Vahdat has been promoted to chief technologist for AI infrastructure, a newly created position reporting directly to CEO Sundar Pichai.
